test_scenarios.name: Homepage Load and Navigation
steps: Click on the 'Find & Reserve' link in the main navigation.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The homepage loads within acceptable time, and navigation to 'Find & Reserve' is successful.

test_scenarios.name: Search for a Property
steps: Enter a valid city/hotel name in the destination field (e.g., 'New York').
Select a check-in and check-out date.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results page displays hotels in the specified location and dates.

test_scenarios.name: Select a Room and Initiate Booking
steps: From the search results, select a hotel.
On the hotel page, choose a room type.
Click on the 'Select' button for the chosen room.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is directed to the 'Review Your Stay' page or similar, displaying selected room details and price.

test_scenarios.name: Account Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their account dashboard or previously viewed page.

test_scenarios.name: Complete a Reservation with Valid Payment
steps: Proceed to the payment page after selecting a room.
Enter valid credit card details and billing address.
Click on the 'Book Now' or similar button to complete the reservation.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The reservation is successfully processed, and a confirmation page/email is displayed with reservation details.
